query:
INSERT INTO assessment_items (assessmentId, requirementId, status, evidence, notes) VALUES 
-- Assessment 1 (ChatAssist Pro - EU AI Act) - 85.5% score
(1, 1, 'compliant', 'Risk classification documented in system design docs v2.3', 'Properly classified as limited risk'),
(1, 2, 'compliant', 'Transparency notice displayed at conversation start', 'Users informed they are interacting with AI'),
(1, 3, 'compliant', 'Human oversight procedures documented in SOP-AI-001', 'Escalation to human agents available'),
(1, 4, 'compliant', 'Technical documentation available in compliance portal', 'Full system architecture documented'),
(1, 5, 'compliant', 'Accuracy metrics tracked: 94.2% intent recognition', 'Monthly accuracy reports generated'),
(1, 6, 'non_compliant', 'Data governance policy needs update for GDPR alignment', 'Action item: Update by Q4'),
(1, 7, 'compliant', 'Bias testing conducted quarterly', 'Latest test: 2024-05-15'),
(1, 8, 'compliant', 'Cybersecurity audit passed 2024-03-01', 'SOC 2 Type II certified'),
(1, 9, 'compliant', 'Logging system captures all interactions', 'Retention: 90 days'),
(1, 10, 'non_compliant', 'Registration pending with EU AI Office', 'Submitted 2024-06-01'),
-- Assessment 3 (RecommendAI - EU AI Act) - 92% score
(3, 1, 'compliant', 'Minimal risk classification documented', 'Product recommendations only'),
(3, 2, 'compliant', 'Clear AI disclosure in product pages', 'Badge: AI-powered recommendations'),
(3, 3, 'not_applicable', 'Human oversight not required for minimal risk', 'N/A per Article 6'),
(3, 4, 'compliant', 'Full technical documentation available', 'Updated monthly'),
(3, 5, 'compliant', 'A/B testing shows 23% conversion improvement', 'Accuracy validated'),
(3, 6, 'compliant', 'Data governance fully compliant', 'Annual audit passed'),
(3, 7, 'compliant', 'Fairness testing across demographics', 'No significant bias detected'),
(3, 8, 'compliant', 'Security measures exceed requirements', 'Penetration tested'),
(3, 9, 'compliant', 'Full audit trail maintained', 'Searchable logs'),
(3, 10, 'not_applicable', 'Registration not required for minimal risk', 'N/A');
